messages.message: we were talking about this... we shohld move spacy into its own service so that we can properly scale its resources independently of app/webdriver-tasks
gotcha; i don't think there's really a short-term solution to this aside from creating a service no?
if we were to design a way to read from Instabase Drive or some file location, are we comfortable with the performance / IO impact that would have?
also wasn't memory loading also an issue that won't be addressed here? Makes sense how it addresses the disk issue
